2022 film by Katie Holmes

Running time93 minutesCountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Alone Together is a 2022 American romantic drama film written and directed by Katie Holmes.[3] The film stars Holmes, Jim Sturgess, Derek Luke, Melissa Leo, Zosia Mamet, and Becky Ann Baker. It premiered at the Tribeca Film Festival on July 14, 2022[4][5] and was released in the United States on July 22, 2022, by Vertical Entertainment.[6]


Synopsis[edit]
The film centers around two strangers who are sharing an Airbnb in New York state during the COVID-19 lockdown.[7]

Cast[edit]
Katie Holmes as June[3]
Jim Sturgess as Charlie[3]
Derek Luke as John
Melissa Leo as Deborah
Zosia Mamet as Margaret
Becky Ann Baker as Jan
Production[edit]
Katie Holmes wrote the film at the very beginning of lockdown in 2020.[8] Alone Together, produced by her new production company called Lafayette Pictures,[1] is her second film as director. She produced the film with Jordan Yale Levine, Jordan Beckerman and Jesse Korman of Yale Productions,[9] and Shaun Sanghani, owner of SSS Entertainment.[2]

Release[edit]
The film had its world premiere at the Tribeca Film Festival on July 14, 2022.[4] Vertical Entertainment acquired North American distribution rights. The film was theatrically released on July 22, 2022 and was released on video on demand on July 29, 2022.[6]

Reception[edit]
Review aggregator Rotten Tomatoes reports that 30% of 37 critics gave the film a positive review, for an average rating of 4.70 out of 10. The site's critics consensus reads: "Director Katie Holmes takes an appealingly low-key approach to her story, but it isn't enough to offset Alone Together's bland characters and overall predictability."[10]
